thread.section_title: The Ampersand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent stay
thread.title_full: Excellent stay - Review of The Ampersand Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: gmofludlow
title: Excellent stay
text: Can't fault the hotel, the staff were amazing with accommodating us. Rooms are large comfortable and clean-possibly the best bed we have ever slept in, location was perfect for getting around London with a bus stop and taxi stand directly outside. Although I would recommend walking around as much as possible around Kensington as its such a relaxed neighbourhood.
